title: Modern Kitchen Inspirations for Creative Designs
text: Innovative Design for kitchen & Home Our Story Since 2005, Urban Homes has redefined luxury kitchen and home design from our flagship showroom in New York City’s Meatpacking District. Led by a third-generation kitchen specialist, we design and supply modern and traditional spaces for residences, multi-unit developments, and retail environments. In addition, our work spans New York, New Jersey, Connecticut, and international locations, blending creativity, technology, and craftsmanship. To ensure the right fit, we tailor each project to lifestyle, architecture, and functional needs while emphasizing refined aesthetics and long-lasting performance. Moreover, our curated collections include custom kitchens, bath cabinetry, closets, doors, and furniture. Finally, every project receives dedicated guidance for a seamless experience from concept to completion.. Our Collections Our Showroom Urban Homes’ state-of-the-art showroom in NYC’s Meatpacking District is a premier destination for luxury kitchen and bath cabinets, offering exceptional design services. Designed to meet urban and suburban needs, it blends sophistication, style, and functionality, inspiring visitors with a modern ambiance. Featuring European and North American brands, the showroom showcases cabinets, closets, appliances, countertops, lighting, faucets, and hardware—each selected for craftsmanship, innovation, and design excellence, from smart appliances to elegant bathroom cabinets.
